materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a view of a valley, with a mountain in the background in the distance, behind clouds. In the center of the photograph, there are a few roofed houses. There are several demarcated pathways amongst the hills. On the right of the photograph, there is a lone tree in the foreground. The top-left of the photograph is folded. The edges of the photograph are curved. There is no inscription on the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Hill settlements with mountain in the distance
subject_terms_1: mountains scenery (landscape) valleys (landforms) hill settlements rural areas
